author: Dario Taraborelli

resources.description:
Sample from the Wikipedia article ratings dump.

The following fields are included:

1. timestamp: 14-digit timestamp (UTC)
2. page_id: article ID
3. page_title: full article title
4. page_namespace: article namespace (0 is for Wikipedia's main article namespace)
5. rev_id: revision ID (article version that was rated)
6. user_id: boolean field set to 0 for anonymous raters and to 1 for registered users
7. rating_key: numeric key of the rating dimension (1: trustworthy, 2: objective, 3: complete, 4: well-written)
8. rating_value: rating value on a 1-5 scale. A value set to 0 indicates that the rater didn't rate the article on the corresponding dimension.
resources.name: aft4_sample.tsv

resources.description:
1-year dump of Wikipedia article ratings. The dataset includes 47,207,448 records corresponding to 11,801,862 unique ratings posted between July 22, 2011 and July 22, 2012. A small sample is available as a separate file.

The following fields are included:

1. timestamp: 14-digit timestamp (UTC)
2. page_id: article ID
3. page_title: full article title
4. page_namespace: article namespace (0 is for Wikipedia's main article namespace)
5. rev_id: revision ID (article version that was rated)
6. user_id: boolean field set to 0 for anonymous raters and to 1 for registered users
7. rating_key: numeric key of the rating dimension (1: trustworthy, 2: objective, 3: complete, 4: well-written)
8. rating_value: rating value on a 1-5 scale. A value set to 0 indicates that the rater didn't rate the article on the corresponding dimension.
resources.name: aft4.tsv.gz

organization.description:
A collection of datasets about Wikipedia and other projects run by the [Wikimedia Foundation](http://wikimediafoundation.org). The collection is open to contributions by researchers not affiliated with the Foundation.

Our overall data policy is to release into the [public domain](http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/) all datasets that don't require attribution and to license datasets that include textual/media contributions from Wikimedians under the appropriate open license, most commonly a [CC BY 3.0 license](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).
organization.title: Wikimedia
organization.name: wikimedia

name: wikipedia-article-ratings
notes: A complete anonymized dump of 11M [article ratings](http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Article_feedback/Version_4) collected over 1 year (July 2011 - July 2012) from the English Wikipedia. [Read more...](http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Article_feedback/Version_4)
title: Wikipedia article ratings
